text: Mwatamikani (achimmasyeto ŵamwalesileo) mwankutama pemo, yankuti pakulipatila (namuno kuti mwalesile ulombela naga eda jao nkanijimale), soni nkasimwalagasya ŵanganyao kuti mwaaŵane (niaganisye yakutila achimisyene). Soni naaŵaga ŵana yiilu basi mwapani (yosope yakusosekwa pa umi) mpaka aŵeleche yiilu yaoyo. Sano naga ali an'jonjecheesye (ŵanache ŵenu), basi mwapani malipilo gao, soni tamani ntemela wakupikanganana (ya malipilogo) chilikati chenu mwaumbone. Nambo naga nkunonopesyana basi (mwanachejo) tiŵajonjechesye (babao ŵakongwe) ŵane
